lead_paragraph: The university’s president said the minimum wage would be increased over the next three academic years.

headline.print_headline: Student Workers  Get Raise at N.Y.U.
headline.main: N.Y.U. Raising Student Workers’ Pay to $15 an Hour

snippet: The university’s president said the minimum wage would be increased over the next three academic years.
abstract: New York University will raise hourly wage of student workers over three years, reaching $15 in 2018-19; move is part of president Andrew Hamilton's effort to address issue of affordability at university.
